E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 2/9/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF Herman Bauer, MR Max Ferran
in return for
SS Juan Chao.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Monday, 5/5/1983
Subject: Progress of Brian Martin
Dear Sir,
Brian Martin is doing pretty good at AA !
He has an ERA of 2.63, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1983
Subject: Progress of Manuel Cepeda
Dear Sir,
Manuel Cepeda has an ERA of 3.71 at A !
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1983
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Willie Jones
